narrative.narrative: Volotea is a Spanish low cost airline, occasionally charter airline, established by Barcelona-based Alaeo S.L., a company created by former Vueling founders, Carlos Muñoz and Lázaro Ros. It commenced operations on 5 April 2012, from Venice Marco Polo Airport. The name 'Volotea' originates from the Spanish verb 'revolotear,' meaning 'to fly around..'
